results.title: Lymphomatoid drug eruption mimicking digitate dermatosis: cross reactivity between two drugs that suppress angiotensin II function.
results.text_hl: A 75-year-old male presented with an @DISEASE_Drug_Eruptions @DISEASE_MESH:D003875 @@@eruption@@@ characteristic of @<m>DISEASE_Parapsoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010267 @@@digitate dermatosis@@@.
